captions.text: Come in Come in Come in wa wa wa
Stop spacing out and follow me (huh)
After being as busy as a bee

When you open your eyes, 
a week has passed (passed) whut?!

If you only chase things 
that are already answered
The answers always run away (run away) UH
Due to boredom which continues everyday
I keep falling out
I can’t adjust myself to the fixed frame
My heart already knows
I will hit on the back of the head strongly

New world even Hwang Jung Min 
would be surprised Yeah

You are not an amateur, 
so what’s the matter
Now move your body & shake your body
Although you sit and tear your hair out,
Problems cannot be solved easily
Everybody Come in Come in Come in wa wa wa
It's all good and good and good
It’s okay to chew out, bite off, and swear
We don’t care (We gotta gotta gotta)
At this moment, the only moment

(We gotta gotta gotta)
I will play around like crazy EH EH
Until the night is over EH EH

Come in Come in Come in wa wa wa
Second Round starts now so listen! (HEY)
Even if somebody clicks his tongue
Somebody points his finger
I don’t mind
Just watch with your arms folded
DJ turn it up now!

Not to any stress disturb us
You only live once

Even though the burden of tomorrow 
oppresses you
I don’t mind Put them back back back
Although I get cornered
Y’all Come in Come in Come in
It’s okay to chew out, bite off, and swear
We don’t care (We gotta gotta gotta)
At this moment, the only moment

Be the best of myself 
(We gotta gotta gotta)
I will play around like crazy EH EH

Come in Come in Come in wa wa wa

(Say to em')
Put your hands up everybody
You all know without saying

To wherever your heart want to

Shout out loud like crazy
To the world where nothing is crazy

I will close my ears (We gotta gotta gotta)

(We gotta gotta gotta)
I will play around like crazy EH EH

comments.author: ryanashin19

comments.text:
+ryanashin19 sorry this is late! ^.^;
0:27, 0:40- Buffy (Kim Juhyeon) 95' liner (second youngest) rapper.
0:31- Moos (Kim Sangbae) 91' liner (oldest) rapper, leader.
0:50, 1:58- Daewon (Park Daewon) 92' liner (second oldest) vocal, main 
dancer, choreographer.
1:00, 1:50, 2:44, 2:55- Lee Geon (Lee Kyungtak) 92' liner (third oldest) 
main vocal.
1:09, 3:00- H.O (Song Jaeho) 95' liner (maknae) vocal.
1:18, 1:45- Heo Jun (I think his last name is Heo and his first name just 
Jun?) 94' liner (third youngest) vocal.
1:38- Jota (Lee Jonghwa) 94' liner (fourth oldest) vocal, rap, acrobatics.

comments.text:
the amount of changes throughout this song is just great. i mean the song 
changes so many times but it still sounds so good. IMO new world is 
definitely way better than yolo. this album is one of those with a main 
track that I actually love. and their dancing is so chill and laid-back, I 
love it!! even though I wanted to see some really cool and more complicated 
choreography, i realized that it doesn't really fit.
they're finally getting the attention that they deserved, so i hope we'll 
see another comeback again this year!!! jtunecamp, you're doing well with 
these boys so far, giving you credit for that...still gonna carefully watch 
you tho if you fck up >_> 
i feel like a mom to all you new mad people (been here since pro c days XD 
), so welcome!!! ﻿
